parameters.name: auto_increment_increment
parameters.description: auto_increment_increment and auto_increment_offset are intended for use with master-to-master replication, and can be used to control the operation of AUTO_INCREMENT columns.

parameters.name: autocommit
parameters.description: The autocommit mode. If set to ON, all changes to a table take effect immediately. If set to OFF, you must use COMMIT to accept a transaction or ROLLBACK to cancel it.
